properties.entry: INSERT INTO BookingStatus (Id, Name, Remarks, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BookingStatus SET Name = ?, Remarks = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?
SELECT Id, Name, Remarks FROM BookingStatus WHERE Id = ?
SELECT Id, Name, Remarks FROM BookingStatus ORDER BY Id DESC
